MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL54 postcode area of Caernarfon, affecting properties in Waenfawr, Rhostryfan and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 08:34AM. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a grounded overhead line. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 10:30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 09:56AM on 31st October 2020
